phrases: This is changed from last episode preview.
She is making me HNNNGGG more and more.
I want my finger in her mouth too.
She just gets more awesome every time.
The brilliant glow of this sky, does it carry right into your heart?
The melody you heard in your dream, it plays like the silence
Even if your hands are still far from that dream,
Come now and remember that kindly voice,
Someone was there singing for you, singing those chords of happiness
Sound of the sky, echo on high, break through that overwhelming sadness
Everything that shines in your eyes
Is part of the real world
Even your tears cannot leave you here to stay forever
In this light pouring down onto you, play tomorrow's song
One Typhoon Passes - What You Really See
Oh, so your dad was a tankman?
He was part of the platoon that led over a thousand civilians and soldiers out of Wardenburg when it was under siege
A legendary hero during that legendary escape!
And after he received a life-threatening injury in battle, he met my mother who was an orderly at the hospital he was sent to!
And you were born out of their love,
Do I look like a potato to you?
My, what a wonderful potato she is!
You raised them very well, Kanata.
We can probably give some to the people in town.
And Klaus should be coming soon.
Should we give some to him as a gift?
You really love Klaus, do not you Kureha?
It is not that I like him,
I just have a lot of respect for him.
She can even play it like this!
The wind is starting to pick up.
The weather might be taking a bad turn.
Should we stop here for today?
Do not you think Rio's been acting strange lately?
She never did like making small talk.
Eat it while it is hot.
She was practically wolfing them down!
No matter how finely you chop them, she seeks, finds, and removes every last piece!
On his left breast, he has a tattoo of the insignia of Platoon 481,
I do not think you have to worry about it.
When the Commander looked down, it was just us worrying, after all.
I am sure she just got over her fear of bell peppers and ate them.
You really love Rio, do not you Kureha?
I have always admired her, after all!
It is time for Noel to sleep.
I will give her half of my bed.
You forgot to put it out.
Looking like you have got everything under control and forgetting one thing is the best part about you.
But you have been forgetting too many things lately.
Are you regretting hanging up on your father?
We cannot do anything about it now.
I will cover whatever mistakes you make.
At least try to be be a cool mentor in front of them.
Sorry to come in the middle of the night.
Major, please come inside for the night.
You will not be going anywhere in this weather.
Even if you are the Desert Wolf.
I told you not to call me that.
How about some hot tea and a bath as an apology?
We appreciate your diligence in completing your mission in this typhoon.
I am sorry we only have leftovers from last night, but please do eat.
You should have woken me up when Klaus got here!
Delicious even after it is cold!
The bell peppers were raised very well too.
I picked them, and I fried them!
You will make a good wife someday.
The Major brought it here for us.
It looks like the conferences still are not going smoothly.
Neither side is making any compromises.
Things would be completely different if Princess Iliya were still alive.
Wait, you cannot not know who she is!
The first daughter of Archduke Arkadia!
The Goddess of Victory of the Helvetian Army,
a tankman as legendary as the Desert Wolf, Major Klaus!
One of the kids at Yumina's church has not been seen since morning.
The river's water has risen quite a bit.
The fields downstream have not been harvested yet.
If the dam breaks, they are all gone.
I am not familiar with the city.
I only took my eyes off him for a second...
Search and rescue is part of our duties.
You know something, do not you.
You came out here because you know where he is.
So we all saved our allowances to buy seeds...
What the hell are you doing?
In a place like this in the middle of a typhoon?
We are risking our lives for you!
You decided to come here yourself!
No one asked for your help!
That is enough out of you!
Kids without parents have to think harder than other kids.
If you because trouble for people, you know who they will blame?
They will go after your Sister too.
And you still feel like whining?
You come to value things that you raise from nothing as much as your own life.
Once eggplants are this big, you can eat them.
They will taste amazing if you pickle them.
Seiya has started climbing back up.
I will take up the rear.
Now there is no way for them to climb back up.
I am sure you will find a way out.
Right now, Miracle Klaus is here!
The ground is starting to collapse.
The water's breaking down the soil...
This is why I hate kids!
Kids who cannot listen should just be tied up and locked in a dark room!
Those three are always watching you.
B- But they will figure something out, right?
They call Klaus a miracle worker, right?
He is not the Desert Wolf or Miracle Klaus.
They just happened to have the same name and look similar.
When they first met, Kureha got excited and decided he was.
You know how Klaus is bad with words.
He never found a way to tell her, and so...
Right now, we have to find a way to rescue a courier
with only a long service history and an aspiring soldier
without a shred of experience from that ledge.
There are not any anchors above them.
They are too far away to throw a rope from here.
If there is a way to throw a rope over there...
I thought that maybe if my father were still alive, he would be like you.
I tell people about him like I knew him well,
but I actually heard it all from other people.
I do not really know much.
He died before I understood anything at all.
Targeting system, E-7 to F-5 activated.
I will protect you just like your father would if he were alive!
I will tell you now that we made it...
You are exactly what I thought you were.
The blue sky after a typhoon passes?
So you played the part the whole time.
Never thought you had it in you.
When I looked into those eyes, shattering Kureha's dreams frightened me more than death.
That is probably how I managed.
In the end, I am just a coward.
That is not true at all!
What someone watching sees and what the person front and center feels are completely different things.
The glasses we call admiration are always out of focus.
Someday, someone will see you through those glasses.
You will know how it feels.
Cannot you at least stay until Kureha wakes up?
Mind telling Kureha something for me?
This baby's the best life-threatening injury I have ever had!
Love and friendship - put these feelings together
And sing of how important they are
I was so happy that I cried
It hurt so bad that I laughed
But that all just goes to show that I am alive
Let us just walk it slowly
Just tell me a bit of what you think
Love and friendship - even though they might waver
I know, you know, little happy
I want us to echo on forever
Can you hear my precious note?
All these words that there are cannot even describe it.
Next time: Departure - When the First Snow Falls
